seo: 通用文件包含检测,漏洞扫描,文件包含漏洞
seo_en: General File Inclusion Detection, Vulnerability Scanning, File Inclusion Vulnerability
summary: 该插件用于检测Web应用中的通用文件包含漏洞，通过发送特定payload并分析响应来判断是否存在文件包含漏洞
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect general file inclusion vulnerabilities in web applications by sending specific payloads and analyzing the responses to determine if a file inclusion vulnerability exists
